about.title: About Imperial Japan Tours
about.intro: Founded with a passion for sharing the beauty of Japan, Imperial Japan Tours has been connecting travelers with authentic Japanese experiences since 2018.
about.story: What began as a small tour service in Tokyo has grown into a premier travel experience company, serving thousands of happy travelers from around the world. Our team of dedicated local guides and travel experts work tirelessly to create journeys that capture the true essence of Japan.
about.mission: To bridge cultures through transformative travel experiences that honor Japanese traditions while creating lasting memories for every guest.
about.value1Desc: The Japanese art of selfless hospitality — anticipating needs before they arise.
about.value2Desc: Every experience is rooted in genuine Japanese culture and local knowledge.
about.value3Desc: We pursue perfection in every detail, from vehicle comfort to guide expertise.
about.value4Desc: We respect and preserve the natural and cultural heritage of Japan.
about.culturalDesc: We believe travel should be a bridge between cultures. Our team works closely with local communities, temples, artisans, and cultural institutions to ensure our tours support and respect the places we visit.

services.title: Tour Packages
services.subtitle: Choose from our carefully curated selection of Japanese travel experiences.

packages.name: Tokyo City Tour
packages.description: Explore the dynamic contrast of Tokyo — from the serene Meiji Shrine to the neon-lit streets of Shibuya. Available as full-day or half-day options.

packages.name: Mount Fuji Day Trip
packages.description: Witness the majesty of Japan's most iconic peak. Visit the 5th Station, explore Hakone, and enjoy views of Lake Kawaguchi.

packages.name: Kyoto Temple Circuit
packages.description: Journey through Kyoto's most magnificent temples and shrines. Walk the iconic bamboo groves and experience traditional tea ceremony.

packages.name: Osaka Food & Culture
packages.description: Discover why Osaka is Japan's kitchen. Taste street food in Dotonbori, visit Osaka Castle, and explore the vibrant Shinsekai district.

packages.name: Nara Heritage Tour
packages.description: Meet the friendly deer of Nara Park, visit the Great Buddha at Todai-ji, and stroll through ancient Kasuga Shrine's lantern-lined paths.

packages.name: Custom Private Tour
packages.nameJp: カスタムプライベートツアー
packages.description: Design your dream Japan experience. Tell us your interests and we'll create a bespoke itinerary tailored just for you.
